name: Gust of Wind: Playable Demo
description:
Embark on a stealth mission set in a post-apocalyptic world of rusted sail ships and old machinery. 

Gust of Wind is a stealth game in development, which alternates between stealth and dialog sections. Missions are small but detailed sandboxes with a lot of climbable elements and freedom of movement.

The story is set in a world where mutant seagulls are scavenging for equipment that will help their home town endure in the constant war against rival factions. The main character is the stealth expert of a crew of warriors sent to scavenge technology detrimental to the survival of their home town.

Credits:

  • Art, design, coding: Samuli Lautjärvi
  • Coding dialog system and editor: Tero Lillbacka
  • Music: Olli Oja ( https://www.olliojamusic.com/ )

Thanks to:

  • Unity
  • FMOD (sound system)
  • zapsplat.com (sound effects)
  • Crest Ocean System (water shader)
  • Dynamic Water Physics 2
  • Microsplat (terrain shader)
  • polyhaven.com (HDRI skyboxes)
